revised_title: Bacteria-Killing Power of Cell Globulin and Blood Serum
tldr: The author discusses the bacteria-killing power of cell globulin and blood serum. They compare the effects of Halliburton's cell globulin and fibrin ferment, and conclude that both substances have bacteria-killing properties. The author also suggests that phagocytes can kill microbes by breaking them down and liberating their contents.
